channel.title: Football on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Football on Game6r

item.title: Penalty Shoot-Out
item.description: Game Football 2015 will give you the opportunity to become the central figure of the world championship. True, you won’t have to participate in all the matches of the championship, it’s enough just to spend a number of dangerous moments. You have to catch the pass, handle the ball and try to finish the combination successfully by scoring a goal. Be careful and attentive, your football rivals 2015 have a very professional goalkeeper and sometimes even a defender manages to get to the goal, who, of course, will try to stop you.
